description: The vessel's IMO number, a unique immutable identifier required for all ships in this database.
The vessel's name.
The vessel's previous name, if any.
The status of the ship, primarily used to determine if it is currently in service.
A code directly corresponding to the status of the ship.
The date from which the above status took effect.
The ship's callsign. May be empty.
The country code of the ship's registered flag.
The date from which the ship began to be associated with its current flag.
The name of the country the ship is registered with.
The ship's MMSI number, a unique ID used for communication. May be empty, and may also be reassigned from ship to ship.
The gross tonnage of the ship, which refers to its overall total internal volume.
The length overall of the ship, which is the maximum length of its hull measured parallel to the waterline.
The level 2 shiptype of the ship, as defined by the StatCode 5 shiptype coding system (https://cdn.ihs.com/www/pdf/Statcode-Shiptype-Coding-System.pdf). May be empty depending on the lower levels.
The level 3 shiptype of the ship, as defined by the StatCode 5 shiptype coding system (https://cdn.ihs.com/www/pdf/Statcode-Shiptype-Coding-System.pdf). May be empty depending on the lower levels.
The level 4 shiptype of the ship, as defined by the StatCode 5 shiptype coding system (https://cdn.ihs.com/www/pdf/Statcode-Shiptype-Coding-System.pdf). May be empty depending on the lower levels.

The level 5 shiptype of the ship, as defined by the StatCode 5 shiptype coding system (https://cdn.ihs.com/www/pdf/Statcode-Shiptype-Coding-System.pdf). Will not be empty unless the ship's type is unknown.
The StatCode of the ship corresponding to the ship's type, as defined by the StatCode 5 shiptype coding system (https://cdn.ihs.com/www/pdf/Statcode-Shiptype-Coding-System.pdf).
Whether or not the ship is on the US OFAC sanction list. May be True, False or empty; assume false if empty.
Whether or not the ship is on the US OFAC non-SDN sanction list. May be True, False or empty; assume false if empty.
Whether or not the ship is on the UN sanction list. May be True, False or empty; assume false if empty.
Whether or not the ship is on the EU sanction list. May be True, False or empty; assume false if empty.
Whether or not the ship is on the US treasury OFAC advisory list. May be 1, 0 or empty, indicating true, false and false respectively.
The name of the ship's group owner company.
The unique identifying company code of the group owner company.
The country in which the group owner company's controlling owners reside.
The country in which the group owner company is located.
The country code of the country in which the group owner company is located.
The country in which the group owner company is registered.
The name of the ship's operator company.
The unique identifying company code of the operator company.
The country in which the operator company's controlling owners reside.
The country in which the operator company is located.
The country code of the country in which the operator company is located.
The country in which the operator company is registered.
The name of the ship's owner company.
The unique identifying company code of the owner company.
The country in which the owner company's controlling owners reside.
The country in which the owner company is located.
The country code of the country in which the owner company is located.
The country in which the owner company is registered.
